components.description: Strips of crispy, fatty, reddish-brown bacon, as fried for breakfast. Depicted as a pair on most platforms.
components.title: Bacon

description: Strips of crispy, fatty, reddish-brown bacon, as fried for breakfast. Depicted as a pair on most platforms.
title: Bacon

version.description:
The Unicode Consortium accepted the following emoji 72 emojis for Unicode 9.0. This update was released on June 21, 2016. Most vendors added support for this update within the 2016 calendar year. Sample images and more about Unicode 9.0.

Emoji 4.0 was published in late 2016, which added additional emoji professions.

New in Unicode 9

emoji_net_data.category: Supplemental Symbols And Pictographs -> Food symbol
emoji_net_data.definition: Strips of cooked bacon, popular with a range of dishes, sometimes to accompany eggs. Bacon was approved as part of Unicode 9.0 in 2016 and a http://emojipedia.org/bacon/
emoji_net_data.name: bacon

bn:00054026n: The edible flesh of animals, especially that of mammals.
Meat is the flesh of an animal which is eaten.
Meat is animal flesh that is eaten as food.
The flesh of an animal used as food.
The flesh of animals (including fishes and birds and snails) used as food

bn:00007847n: Cured meat from the sides, belly or back of a pig.
Back and sides of a hog salted and dried or smoked; usually sliced thin and fried
Bacon is a meat product prepared from a pig and usually cured.
Bacon is a cured meat prepared from a pig.
The flesh of the back and sides of a pig, salted and dried, used as food.

bn:00035650n: Any substance consumed to provide nutritional support for the body. For prepared ready-to-eat food, use dish: Q746549.
Any substance consumed by living organisms to sustain life.
Any substance that can be consumed by living organisms, especially by eating, in order to sustain life.
Any solid substance (as opposed to liquid) that is used as a source of nourishment
Food is any substance consumed to provide nutritional support for the body.
